tool_description: Analyzes battery health metrics including degradation, charge cycles, and overall condition to determine if replacement is needed.

device_model.description: Specific device model (e.g., iPhone 14, Samsung Galaxy S23)

error_messages: Invalid device model: Provide a recognized smartphone or tablet model name.
Voltage out of range: Battery voltage must be between 2.5V and 5.0V for safety.
Invalid charge cycles: Charge cycles must be a positive integer if provided.
Invalid age: Battery age must be a positive integer representing months if provided.
usage: Input the device model and current voltage reading. Optionally include charge cycles and age for more accurate analysis. The tool will assess battery health and recommend replacement if needed.

health_percentage.description: Battery health as percentage of original capacity

degradation_level.description: Battery degradation level: minimal, moderate, severe, critical

estimated_remaining_life.description: Estimated remaining useful life in months
